title: How many authors actually get published? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you mean by traditional publishing houses, probably less than 2 percent. If you mean published in any way (indie, vanity, etc.) then probably upwards of 75 percent or so. A couple of years ago, Amazon estimated that there were 4,000,000 books published annually. Doing the math, there maybe as many as 6,000,000 books being written yearly.

Impossible to answer this question as posed. There’s the ones who get published by going the traditional publishing route. And there’s the booming self publishing industry. Many terrific books—and some not so terrific. Probably—in the time it took to answer this question—six more independently published books hit the market-place. So there.
